Package com.pureinsights.exercise.backend.repository

Class SolrMovieRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.pureinsights.exercise.backend.repository.SolrMovieRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SolrMovieRepository, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<MovieSolr,String>
@Repository public class SolrMovieRepositoryImpl extends Object implements SolrMovieRepository
In-memory implementation of SolrMovieRepository

  • Method Details

    • createSolrCollection

      public void createSolrCollection() throws org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException, IOException
      Creates a Solr collection named "films" with default config if it does not exist.
      Throws:
      org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException - if there is an error executing the request
      IOException - if there is an error creating the collection

    • postConstruct

      @PostConstruct public void postConstruct() throws IOException, org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
      Loads the movie data from the CSV file and indexes it in Solr. This method is executed after the creation of the bean.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there's an error reading the CSV file
      org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException - if there's an error communicating with Solr

    • transformValues

      public String transformValues(String value, String name)
      Transforms the given value based on the provided field name. If the field name is "Rate" and the value is "No Rate", it will return "0". If the field name is "Votes" and the value is "No Votes", it will return "0". Otherwise, it will return the original value.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to transform
      name - the name of the field to transform
      Returns:
      the transformed value

    • findTopRatedMovieYearly

      public List<MovieSolr> findTopRatedMovieYearly(org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
      Description copied from interface: SolrMovieRepository
      Finds the top-rated movie for each year, sorted by the given sort order.
      Specified by:
      findTopRatedMovieYearly in interface SolrMovieRepository
      Parameters:
      sort - The sort order to apply.
      Returns:
      A list of MovieSolr objects, one for each year.

    • findTopRatedMovieForYear

      public List<MovieSolr> findTopRatedMovieForYear(String dateInput)
      Description copied from interface: SolrMovieRepository
      Retrieves the top movie one year, sorted by the given sort order.
      Specified by:
      findTopRatedMovieForYear in interface SolrMovieRepository
      Parameters:
      dateInput - The date input to use for filtering the results. (just the year)
      Returns:
      A list of Movie objects, one for each year.

    • findAllByDate

      Description copied from interface: SolrMovieRepository

      Specified by:

    • findTopRatedByGenre

      public List<MovieSolr> findTopRatedByGenre(String genre, int amount)
      Description copied from interface: SolrMovieRepository
      Finds the top-rated movies of a given genre using Solr search.
      Specified by:
      findTopRatedByGenre in interface SolrMovieRepository
      Parameters:
      genre - the genre of the movies to retrieve
      amount - the maximum number of movies to retrieve
